title: Executive Order 5271-Restoration of Lands Withdrawn for Power Site Reserve No. 435, Colorado
content: So much of the orders of December 4, 1909, creating Temporary Power-Site Withdrawal No. 81, and July 2, 1910, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 81, as affects the lands hereinafter described is hereby revoked:
T. 3 S., R. 72 W., sec. 8, SE. ¼ of SW. ¼
sec. 17, E. ½, E. ½ of NW. ¼
sec. 21, S. ½ of NE. ¼, E. ½ of SE. ¼
sec. 26, SW. ¼ of NW. ¼, SW. ¼
sec. 27, S. ½ of NE. ¼, N. ½ of S. ½.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5271-Restoration of Lands Withdrawn for Power Site Reserve No. 435, Colorado Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361123
